long_description: NiteRider CherryBomb is a rear safety light featuring a half watt LED visible up to 1 mile. Multidirectional light beam is designed for maximum rider visibility. Flash and steady mode available. Reflective insert enhances rider visibility even when light is off. Clip and bike mount included for flexible mounting options. Batteries also included.
short_description: NiteRider CherryBomb is a rear safety light featuring a half watt LED visible up to 1 mile.
